___header.description: The name of the header that includes the temporary identifier for the current browser session.

___enabled.description: Configure if an instance ID is added to the headers of a POST request.

___logging.description: Specifies if and how log messages should be collected and sent.

___threshold.description: Specifies how often to publish collected log messages.

___messages.description: The maximum number of log messages to gather before publishing them.

___seconds.description: The maximum number of seconds to keep log messages before publishing them.

___enabled.description: Tells if log processing should be performed at all.

___requestPolicy.description: Specifies if the messages are pushed as an array or each message on its own.

___retry.description: Specifiy if the activity should retry to submit messages.

___seconds.description: The time interval in seconds between the retries. Should be higher than 'threshold.seconds'.

___retries.description: Number of retries until messages are deleted.

name: laxar-log-activity
description: Collects and sends log messages to a configured service.
